item.title: Meet JACK & JILL , Android’s experimental toolchain
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: JACK & JILL are part of the new tool chain for android and in the words of Android Developer Blog they are designed to improve build times and simplify development by reducing dependencies on other tools
